excerpt: In a Canadian village, a newly arrived British family faces institutional corruption after accusing the town patriarch of pedophilia.
title: Never Take Candy from A Stranger

excerpt: In turn-of-the-century New Orleans, Ava Gardner plays a woman scorned who transforms inherited money into a weapon of romantic revenge against her former lover, played by Robert Mitchum, with tragic results.
title: My Forbidden Past

excerpt: An alien creature beamed through a satellite dish terrorizes a California family.
title: TerrorVision

excerpt: Seeking to lure Sidney Prescott out of hiding, Ghostface carves his way through the cast of a horror movie based on her life.
title: Scream 3

excerpt: Three years after his abduction by aliens, a man returns to his wife and young son, but is he still human?
title: Xtro
